forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 64. West wind around 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 54. Southwest wind 3 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

weather_report:
As the afternoon unfolds in Downtown San Francisco, warmth speaks softly in the color of the sky, a pristine azure canvas stretching endlessly above. The breeze carries with it the lingering whispers of summer—gentle yet invigorating—as it dances through the streets with gusts that playfully tussle the hair of passersby. Sunlight bathes the city, suggesting a high near 64 degrees. The forecast seems to promise clarity, yet the horizon hints at a shy marine layer that lingers not too far off, like an old friend peeking from behind a veil.

As evening arrives, the city will slip into a comfortable embrace of coolness, settling around 54 degrees. A subtle southwest wind will continue to caress the area, setting the stage for a night adorned with starlit splendor. For those venturing out, a light jacket should suffice, complementing the soft layers of evening air. Ideal pursuits may range from strolling leisurely along the waterfront, savoring the gentle murmur of the waves, to finding solace in a cozy café, where one might curl up with a good book. The evening holds the promise of both simplicity and wonder, a perfect embodiment of San Francisco's charm.
